subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kevin Garnett, who turned 37 in May and is in his 19th professional season, has been a vocal leader for the Nets, but his contributions on the court have been far quieter.
snippet: Kevin Garnett, who turned 37 in May and is in his 19th professional season, has been a vocal leader for the Nets, but his contributions on the court have been far quieter.
